short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight and open source extension to block distracting websites and enhance productivity!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusBlock is a lightweight and open-source extension designed to help you block distracting websites and enhance productivity.

Key Features:

1. Pomodoro Timer: Optimize productivity by blocking and unblocking sites at scheduled intervals.
2. Tabs Analytics: Gain valuable insights to better understand your internet usage.
3. Temporary Unblock: Strike a balance between focus and leisure, preventing users from spending time excessively.
4. Shadow DOM: Provide a seamless and hassle-free browsing experience.
